title: I got a chat ban for this??????? riot plz
body:
From this game only I get a chat ban. Riot, start watching the games and ban the griefers instead of punishing me...

Game 1
In-Game
JustLetMeFarmFFS: guys
JustLetMeFarmFFS: you can be toxic
JustLetMeFarmFFS: and you can also go afk
JustLetMeFarmFFS: u wont get banned
JustLetMeFarmFFS: this is new riot policy
JustLetMeFarmFFS: yes more toxic katarina (katarina in other team flames me)
JustLetMeFarmFFS: nice katarina
JustLetMeFarmFFS: u wont get ban
JustLetMeFarmFFS: so keep going
JustLetMeFarmFFS: da warwick dog (warwick says im a kurwa)
JustLetMeFarmFFS: say woof woof
JustLetMeFarmFFS: well that was a fail
JustLetMeFarmFFS: wtf u want
JustLetMeFarmFFS: lmao what
JustLetMeFarmFFS: call me a trolelr again and illf king leave u solo bot (my adc spam pings me and flames me because she is missing cs)
JustLetMeFarmFFS: k bye
JustLetMeFarmFFS: stay solo
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ok
JustLetMeFarmFFS: cus she miod
JustLetMeFarmFFS: oh u need my help bot
JustLetMeFarmFFS: i see
JustLetMeFarmFFS: lol wtf
JustLetMeFarmFFS: u must be trolling miss f (miss f suicides against nami and jinx for some reason and calls me a griefer)
JustLetMeFarmFFS: why did u attack
JustLetMeFarmFFS: u wont fking win against jinx and nami
JustLetMeFarmFFS: just farm and play passive
JustLetMeFarmFFS: 55 cs
JustLetMeFarmFFS: 84 cs
JustLetMeFarmFFS: sur
JustLetMeFarmFFS: really?
JustLetMeFarmFFS: hahahahahahha this mf
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ahahahahahhaaha
JustLetMeFarmFFS: shes calling me a troll
JustLetMeFarmFFS: dude
JustLetMeFarmFFS: muted
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ur so bad
JustLetMeFarmFFS: i literally served u two free kills and u didnt get one
JustLetMeFarmFFS: its hard to play when she flames me
JustLetMeFarmFFS: for her own faults
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ye im not heloing u
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ur useless
JustLetMeFarmFFS: shh
JustLetMeFarmFFS: nah
JustLetMeFarmFFS: nah
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ez bot
JustLetMeFarmFFS: lol
JustLetMeFarmFFS: this mf gave u free kills
JustLetMeFarmFFS: how did u win bot 1v2 when we lost turret wtf
JustLetMeFarmFFS: that logic
JustLetMeFarmFFS: we need drakes
JustLetMeFarmFFS: i did E sylas
JustLetMeFarmFFS: but he was fking 1v4
JustLetMeFarmFFS: u think my shield is 1000hp?
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ok man whatever
JustLetMeFarmFFS: ye this mf is bad
JustLetMeFarmFFS: shes noob
JustLetMeFarmFFS: gg
JustLetMeFarmFFS: EZ
Post-Game
JustLetMeFarmFFS: rep this mf for grief

replies.body:
https://eune.op.gg/summoner/userName=justletmefarmffs

also my match history, carrying every single game right now. but hey, riot bans the people who wants to win.
Is there anything you think you've said, that could've gotten you punished? Anything at all? I'll give you a chance to reflect. If you cant, i'll point them out for you.
If you believe this chat log equals a deserved ban you surely must be a very sensitive individual.

Your feeling was hurt because the ADC called you a troll. And am the sensitive one? You've also undermined any attempt to win just so you can get your petty revenge. From leaving the ADC, to constantly jabbing him with annoyances and still you don't understand the reason for the ban??

Do you kiss yourself in front of the mirror too?
